songs.title: Codeine
songs.lyrics:

That pussy so good like Codeine

I wanna roll you like dro but I can't share this weed
Can't let no nigga hit this blunt can't let no nigga hit this cup
Yeah, man I can't get off these drugs

[Chorus:]
That pussy so good like Codeine
That pussy like a bag of that good
That pussy so good like Codeine
That pussy like a bag of that good

Im higher than a bitch can't lie right now
Pussy all in my face look at my eyes right now
I'm gone off them drugs mouth full of slugs
My niggas tell me I'm slipping but I don't give a fuck

Pull up on a nigga right now come and get that ass ate up

That pussy so good like Codeine
